vote.title: Authorize a three-year service contract in the amount of $263,100.00, with two one-year renewal options in the amount of $175,400.00, as detailed in the Fiscal Information section, for commercial insurance and broker of record services for the Office of Risk Management - Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc., most advantageous proposer of three - Not to exceed $438,500.00 - Financing:  Risk Management Program Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
